price: Kuma idan waɗanda suka kãfirta suka gan ka, bã su riƙon ka fãce da izgili (sunã cẽwa), "Shin, wannan ne ke ambatar gumãkanku?" Alhãli kuwa sũ, ga ambatar Mai rahama, mãsu kãfirta ne.
arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي يَذۡكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَهُم بِذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ
footnotes: * Sun kasance sunã aibanta wanda yake musun gumãkansu alhãli kuwa sũ, sunã musun zaman Allah Mai rahama ya kasance abin bautãwa guda. Wannan shi ne gãyar jãhilci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
